snippet: The Houston (Texas) Telegraph of the 5th instant, comes to us with some further particulars, more definite in detail, than any we have yet hard had, concerning the movement on foot in the States of Coalmile and Tamaulipas, to declare their indepen...
lead_paragraph: The Houston (Texas) Telegraph of the 5th instant, comes to us with some further particulars, more definite in detail, than any we have yet hard had, concerning the movement on foot in the States of Coalmile and Tamaulipas, to declare their independence of Mexico. We quite:

headline.main: Important from the Rio Grande-The Revolutionery Moement in Tamaulipas.
